title: Implement IntentExtractor - Extract user's concept definition from prompt
description: Phase 0: Analyze system prompt + examples to extract what 'milestone' (or any concept) means to THIS user. Returns: concept, definition, positive/negative indicators, boundary cases.
close_reason: Implemented IntentExtractor with LLM-based intent extraction. All 10 unit tests passed. Extracts concept definition, positive/negative indicators, boundary cases from system prompt + examples.

title: Implement 2-stage evaluator (Construction + Reasoning)
description: Create evaluator that separately measures: 1) Construction quality (entities/state/actions/constraints), 2) Reasoning path correctness
close_reason: Implemented TwoStageEvaluator with construction and reasoning scoring. All 11 unit tests passed. Returns 7 feedback columns for detailed analysis.

title: Update meta-prompt template with intent-grounded construction
description: Modify construction phase to REQUIRE referencing user intent. Add intent_reference section. Ground entities/state/actions/constraints in user's specific definition.
close_reason: Added INTENT_AWARE_META_PROMPT_TEMPLATE and construct_intent_aware_content() method to MetaPrompt class. Template enforces intent grounding with explicit instructions for indicators, boundary cases, and few-shot explanations.

title: XMLOutputParser - Parse construction and think tags
description: Parse <construction> and <think> XML tags from LLM output

title: Enhance TwoStageEvaluator with intent alignment scoring
description: Add intent parameter to evaluate_construction(). Score = 50% completeness + 50% intent alignment. Check if construction references user's definition and uses intent indicators.

title: TwoPhaseOptimizer - Main 2-phase training orchestrator
description: Orchestrate Phase 1 (construction) and Phase 2 (reasoning) optimization separately

title: Fix meta-prompt template to generate complete prompts
description: Modify DEFAULT_META_PROMPT_TEMPLATE to instruct LLM to include actual examples instead of placeholders like {examples1}
close_reason: Fixed meta-prompt template with explicit anti-placeholder instructions

title: Create IntentAwarePromptOptimizer with 3-phase flow
description: Orchestrate: Phase 0 (Intent) → Phase 1 (Construction) → Phase 2 (Reasoning). Pass intent to all phases. Evaluate with intent alignment.

title: Fix meta-prompt to preserve output format (binary vs multi-category)
description: Meta-prompt was allowing LLM to change output format from binary (True/False) to 4-way classification. Added CRITICAL section to enforce preserving original output schema.
close_reason: Fixed by adding PRESERVE OUTPUT FORMAT section to meta_prompt.py lines 56-63. Prevents LLM from changing binary classification to multi-category.

title: Analyze current optimization flow
description: Document how PromptLearningOptimizer works: meta-prompt construction, optimization loop, example handling

title: Update test_optimization.py with 2-stage evaluation
description: Modify test to use new 2-stage evaluator and report construction vs reasoning scores separately
close_reason: Created demo_two_stage_evaluator.py demonstrating 2-stage evaluation with detailed metrics, insights, and breakdown by correctness. Validates construction + reasoning scoring approach.

title: ReasoningPathEvaluator - Evaluate reasoning logic paths
description: Track good/bad reasoning paths and compare with groundtruth logic

title: Add auto-fill logic for remaining placeholders
description: In PromptLearningOptimizer, detect and auto-fill any placeholders {exampleN} with actual training examples after meta-prompt generation
close_reason: Implemented _auto_fill_example_placeholders() method and integrated into optimize() loop. Auto-fills {exampleN} placeholders with actual training data.

title: ConstructionSimilarityEvaluator - Evaluate construction similarity with groundtruth
description: Measure similarity between generated construction and groundtruth (90% threshold)

title: ConstructionExtractor - Extract construction elements from LLM output
description: Extract entities, state variables, actions, and constraints from construction phase output

title: TwoPhaseMetaPrompt - Build 2-phase meta-prompts
description: Construct meta-prompts for construction and reasoning phases with good/bad path examples
